description: The contract is for the maintenance of emergency generators in various health facilities across the country.
full_summary:
**Generator Maintenance Contract (NCR)**
=====================================================

**Title:** Generator Maintenance Contract (NCR)
--------------------------------------------

**Reference Number:** cb-9322-90408442
**Contracting Entity:** Health Canada (HC)
**Notice Type:** Demande de propositions

**Description:**
---------------

Health Canada is seeking a contractor to provide maintenance services for emergency generators located in all Custodial Lab Buildings in the National Capital Region (NCR). The selected contractor will be responsible for ensuring the generators operate properly and meet mandatory maintenance requirements by law.

**Key Requirements:**
--------------------

*   **Security Clearance:** Only contractors holding a valid Reliability Status will be granted access to protected information, assets, or sensitive work sites.
*   **No Removal of Protected Materials:** The contractor must not remove any protected materials from the designated work sites, and their personnel must be aware of and comply with this restriction.
*   **Security-Centric Subcontracting:** Any subcontracts that include security requirements must be approved by Health Canada/PHAC in writing before they can be awarded.
*   **Multi-Year Contract:** A multi-year contract for the maintenance of the generators and associated fuel lines will be issued competitively.

**Business Requirements and Schedules:**

*   **Procurement Approach:** Competitive - Open bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest price
*   **Regions of Opportunity:** National Capital Region (NCR)
*   **Regions of Delivery:** National Capital Region (NCR)

**Contractual Information:**
---------------------------

*   **Contract Duration:** Expected contract start date: 2023-11-01; expected contract end date: 2025-10-31
*   **Contractor Contact:** Rene Beauchamp, rene.beauchamp@hc-sc.gc.ca, (613) 716-5315

**Notice URL and Attachments:**

*   The complete notice and attachments can be downloaded from the following links:
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/11582/amd-01-rfp-1000253844.pdf
    *   https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender\_notice/9322/demande-de-propositiondeg-1000253844.pdf
